Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Directs the commissioner of taxation and finance to utilize a third-party evaluator for investigating the effectiveness of state tax incentives
Summary: Directs the commissioner of taxation and finance to utilize a third-party evaluator for investigating the effectiveness of state tax incentives.
ActClause: AN ACT to direct the commissioner of taxation and finance to utilize a third-party evaluator for investigating the effectiveness of state tax incentives
